Function that extract column labels from CDISC dataset

get_variable_labels.Rd

get_variable_labels(data, columns = NULL, fill = TRUE)

Arguments

data

(data.frame) any CDISC data set

columns

optional, (character) column names to extract the labels from. If (NULL) then all columns are being used.

fill

boolean in case the label attribute does not exist if TRUE the variable names is returned, otherwise NA

Value

labels of the columns

Examples

library(scda)
ADSL <- synthetic_cdisc_data("latest")$adsl

get_variable_labels(ADSL)
#>                                   STUDYID 
#>                        "Study Identifier" 
#>                                   USUBJID 
#>               "Unique Subject Identifier" 
#>                                    SUBJID 
#>        "Subject Identifier for the Study" 
#>                                    SITEID 
#>                   "Study Site Identifier" 
#>                                       AGE 
#>                                     "Age" 
#>                                       SEX 
#>                                     "Sex" 
#>                                      RACE 
#>                                    "Race" 
#>                                   COUNTRY 
#>                                 "Country" 
#>                                     DTHFL 
#>                      "Subject Death Flag" 
#>                                     INVID 
#>                 "Investigator Identifier" 
#>                                    INVNAM 
#>                       "Investigator Name" 
#>                                       ARM 
#>              "Description of Planned Arm" 
#>                                     ARMCD 
#>                        "Planned Arm Code" 
#>                                    ACTARM 
#>               "Description of Actual Arm" 
#>                                  ACTARMCD 
#>                         "Actual Arm Code" 
#>                                   REGION1 
#>                     "Geographic Region 1" 
#>                                   STRATA1 
#>                 "Stratification Factor 1" 
#>                                   STRATA2 
#>                 "Stratification Factor 2" 
#>                                    BMRKR1 
#>            "Continuous Level Biomarker 1" 
#>                                    BMRKR2 
#>           "Categorical Level Biomarker 2" 
#>                                     ITTFL 
#>         "Intent-To-Treat Population Flag" 
#>                                     SAFFL 
#>                  "Safety Population Flag" 
#>                                  BMEASIFL 
#>      "Response Evaluable Population Flag" 
#>                                   BEP01FL 
#>     "Biomarker Evaluable Population Flag" 
#>                                    RANDDT 
#>                   "Date of Randomization" 
#>                                   TRTSDTM 
#> "Datetime of First Exposure to Treatment" 
#>                                   TRTEDTM 
#>  "Datetime of Last Exposure to Treatment" 
#>                                    EOSSTT 
#>                     "End of Study Status" 
#>                                    EOTSTT 
#>                 "End of Treatment Status" 
#>                                     EOSDT 
#>                       "End of Study Date" 
#>                                     EOSDY 
#>               "End of Study Relative Day" 
#>                                   DCSREAS 
#>   "Reason for Discontinuation from Study" 
#>                                     DTHDT 
#>                           "Date of Death" 
#>                                   DTHCAUS 
#>                          "Cause of Death" 
#>                                    DTHCAT 
#>                 "Cause of Death Category" 
#>                                  LDDTHELD 
#>    "Elapsed Days from Last Dose to Death" 
#>                                  LDDTHGR1 
#> "Last Dose to Death - Days Elapsed Grp 1" 
#>                                  LSTALVDT 
#>                   "Date Last Known Alive" 
#>                       study_duration_secs 
#>       "NOT A STANDARD BUT NEEDED FOR RCD" 
get_variable_labels(ADSL, c("AGE", "RACE", "BMRKR1"))
#>                            AGE                           RACE 
#>                          "Age"                         "Race" 
#>                         BMRKR1 
#> "Continuous Level Biomarker 1" 
get_variable_labels(ADSL, c("AGE", "RACE", "BMRKR1", "xyz"))
#>                            AGE                           RACE 
#>                          "Age"                         "Race" 
#>                         BMRKR1                            xyz 
#> "Continuous Level Biomarker 1"                             NA 

ADSL$NEW_COL <- 1
get_variable_labels(ADSL, c("AGE", "RACE", "BMRKR1", "NEW_COL"))
#>                            AGE                           RACE 
#>                          "Age"                         "Race" 
#>                         BMRKR1                        NEW_COL 
#> "Continuous Level Biomarker 1"                      "NEW_COL" 
get_variable_labels(ADSL, c("AGE", "RACE", "BMRKR1", "NEW_COL"), fill = FALSE)
#>                            AGE                           RACE 
#>                          "Age"                         "Race" 
#>                         BMRKR1                        NEW_COL 
#> "Continuous Level Biomarker 1"                             NA
